short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A modern tab manager with notes-tab related, search, and rich text editing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction
TabNotepad is a powerful and intuitive browser extension designed to enhance your tab management experience. With features like tab quick search, and integrated note-taking, TabNotepad helps you stay organized and productive while browsing.

Key Features
- Tab Management: Easily view and switch between all open tabs
- Smart Search: Quickly find tabs based on title or URL
- Rich Text Notes: Create and edit notes with formatting options
- Auto-Save: Notes are automatically saved as you type
- Dark Mode: Eye-friendly dark theme for comfortable use
